German[edit]

Etymology[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

Noun[edit]

Samstag m (genitive Samstags or Samstages, plural Samstage)

  1. (now dominant except in former East Germany) Saturday

Usage notes[edit]

Samstag is a common word for â€œSaturdayâ€ in western Germany, southern Germany, Austria, and Switzerland (in standard usage). See Sonnabend for information on this synonym.

Synonyms[edit]

  • (eastern and, traditionally, northern Germany): Sonnabend
